column1: I swear - I don't put pseudo code I get told off for having bad variable names and things that don't match... I put pseudocode and I still get grief!
I really hate people who downvote for no reason. Just tell me what your problem is in a comment after you downvote. God!

I want them to resize based on the length of the data they're showing.
